name: AddedSolutions, LLC
description:
AddedSolutions, LLC is a Marketing and Sales Consultant service company. Successful experience with startup and F1000 public companies. A Silicon Valley-based business and was founded in 1998.
Services:
- Comprehensive Sales Plans and Strategy ( B2B, B2C, OEM, Distribution, Reseller).
- Contract Sales
- Company and Product Branding.
- Business Plans and Marketing Plans.
- SEM - Online advertising, Google Adword management.
- SEO - Placing in the Top 10 on Google, Yahoo and Bing.
